data.caption: Reply To Clarification Sought With Respect To Significant Movement In Price Of Company'S Security
data.news_body: Reply to clarification sought

data.caption: Clarification sought from Aarti Surfactants Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Aarti Surfactants Ltd on September 18, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that Board of Directors at its Meeting held on Friday, October 29, 2021, approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2021.
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 we enclose the following:-

- Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2021;
- Audited Standalone and Consolidated Statement of Assets and Liabilities;
- Audited Standalone and Consolidated Cash Flow Statement;
- Auditor's Report on Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2021.

Meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 12:30 p.m. and concluded at 2:00 p.m.
